name: Pango Land
summary:
Pango, Piggy, Fox, Squirrel and Bunny… they all invite you to their home with lots of games and activities. Pangoland is the first game that gives free rein to your little ones’ imagination. With this open world application, kids can explore a fascinating universe and enjoy a freedom like they have never experienced before. 

In Pangoland, everyone can find his own way to play and everyday is full of surprises. You can change the season, the weather and even switch from day to night in one click. It is cold outside and you feel like staying at home? Then light a fire, decorate the Christmas tree with Pango, cook a delicious meal and invite all characters for a lovely dinner. 

You prefer adventure and exploration? Don’t wait any longer and take your car to discover exciting activities. Helping Bunny to grow vegetables in the garden, digging up prehistoric fossils with Squirrel, building a robot in Fox’s workshop or making a funny snowman with Piggy…everything is possible! 

More than ever before, friendship and generosity are at the heart of the game with tender moments of complicity in a sweet and colorful world. 

FEATURES
- A playful open world for boundless fun
- Change seasons to suit your mood
- Secret mini-games to discover
- Hundreds of objects to interact with
- Switch from day to night
- Perfect for children (3 and above) 
- A clear and intuitive application
- Pango’s lovely and colorful universe
- No stress, no time limit
- No advertising

“We spent a lot of time testing the application with children to find the perfect design and features. And the result is really great!”. Lise Mélinand, Art Directror at Studio Pango and former teacher in primary school.

REVIEWS
- "With its’ cute graphics and endless activities, Pangoland is sure to keep kids busy exploring and having fun. 4/5" // 148 Apps

- “Pangoland is a game that can truly develop children’s imagination and creativity. All the kids who tried the app were fascinating by this lovely world." // Lauriane Consol, Speech Therapist

- "One of the most ambitious games for kids! 5/5" // Super-Julie

- "A very beautiful creation." // VIPad

TECHNICAL COMMENTS
Pangoland has been optimized for devices with 1 GB RAM and over.
